pages.text: 54|50|haey batobanhchea robsa yeung( towkean aveimuoy)  ku kreante  yeung pol peakyamuoymeat( vea nung kaetlaeng phleam)dauchchea muoy  bbrechaphnek bonnaoh .
54|51|haey chea karpit nasa  yeung ban bamphlanh puok del ban  brachheang dauch puok anak .  dau che  neah  tae mean anaknea yk thveuchea merien der  ryyte
54|52|haey real avei  del puokke ban br pru td vea  ku sthetnow knong  sievphow kamntheto( lav ho l mah hvou sa) .
54|53|haey real kechchakar tauch  ning thom ku trauv ke kttra .

54|55|del sthetnow kanleng sachch kber mcheasa del meanamnach mean  anoupheap bamphot .
55|1|a l laoh mha sabborsa .
55|2|trong ban bangrien kompir kuor an( dl mnoussa lok) .
55|3|trong ban bangkeut mnoussa lok .

55|8|daembi komaoy puok anak bampean leu pheap you tde thmr noh .
55|9|haey chaur puok anak brate b tde knong kar thloeng aoy ban troemotrauv haey  kom thveu aoy khveah phnekachonhching aoy saoh .
55|10|haey phendei  trong ban bangkeut vea( reabasmae) samreab satv  lok .
55|11|daoy now leu vea  mean phlechheu  ning daem lmeu del mean changkom  phle cheachraen .
55|12|ning kreabthonhnhocheate del mean saambk  promteang roukkhcheate del  mean klenokraaub .
